text: Prezhde My otpravili Nashikh poslannikov s yasnymi znameniyami i nisposlali s nimi pisaniye i vesy, chtoby lyudi priderzhivalis' spravedlivosti; My nisposlali takzhe [umeniye plavit'] zhelezo, v kotorom soderzhatsya i sil'noye zlo, i pol'za dlya lyudey. [Vse eto] - radi togo, chtoby Allakh udostoverilsya v tom, kto pomogayet Yemu i Yego poslannikam vtayne. Voistinu, Allakh - sil'nyy, velikiy
